languages.text: "Ха. Я когда-то так же думала, когда только к Леди Теодоре попала... со временем привыкнешь. Хочешь, покажу, где на корабле самый сносный кабак?"
"Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"
languages.original_text: "Ха. Я когда-то так же думала, когда только к Леди Теодоре попала... со временем привыкнешь. Хочешь, покажу, где на корабле самый сносный кабак?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “哈，当我第一次遇见西奥多拉夫人时，我也是这么怀疑的……这件事情你以后就会习惯了。要不要我带你去这艘船上最不差劲的酒吧转转？”
languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: “哈，当我第一次遇见西奥多拉夫人时，我也是这么怀疑的……这件事情你以后就会习惯了。要不要我带你去这艘船上最不差劲的酒吧转转？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ha ! Je me suis dit la même chose quand j'ai commencé à fréquenter dame Théodora... Vous finirez par vous y faire. En attendant, vous voulez que je vous montre le point d'eau le moins ignoble du vaisseau ? »
languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Je me suis dit la même chose quand j'ai commencé à fréquenter dame Théodora... Vous finirez par vous y faire. En attendant, vous voulez que je vous montre le point d'eau le moins ignoble du vaisseau ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ja. Eso mismo pensaba yo cuando entré a trabajar para lady Theodora... Se acostumbrará a ello. ¿Quiere que le enseñe el tugurio menos lamentable de la nave?».
languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: «Ja. Eso mismo pensaba yo cuando entré a trabajar para lady Theodora... Se acostumbrará a ello. ¿Quiere que le enseñe el tugurio menos lamentable de la nave?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あら。私もレディ・シオドーラに加わったばかりのころは同じように思ってたけど…結局は慣れちゃうわよ。このシップで一番マシな水飲み場に案内しましょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: 「あら。私もレディ・シオドーラに加わったばかりのころは同じように思ってたけど…結局は慣れちゃうわよ。このシップで一番マシな社交場に案内しましょうか？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ha. Das dachte ich auch, als ich Lady Theodora kennengelernt habe ... Man gewöhnt sich daran. Soll ich Euch den Weg zur am wenigsten schlechten Kneipe an Bord zeigen?"
languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha. Das dachte ich auch, als ich Lady Theodora kennengelernt habe ... Man gewöhnt sich daran. Soll ich Euch den Weg zur am wenigsten schlechten Kneipe an Bord zeigen?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"

languages.text: "Ha. Leydi Theodora'yı rastlaştığımızda ben de aynısını düşünmüştüm... Eninde sonunda alışırsın. Gemideki en fena barın yerini göstermemi ister misin?"
languages.original_text: "Ha. I used to think the same way when I first fell in with Lady Theodora... You'll get used to it eventually. Want me to show you the way to the least worst watering hole on the ship?"
